Characters

HEAT

HEAT - Until recent times AYTLO was his territory, but now, because the JUMPER wants to control the spot, he has to resist him. He stand out in close-in fighting because of his strength, speed and agility. The sweat on his palms contains nitroglycerin, which he can ignite to create fireballs.

ASURA

ASURA - his goal in AYTLO is to take control of the territory. He was weak since childhood, went through all the difficulties at the expense of the evil energy that engulfed him. He does not stand out in a fight, but adjusts to the opponent, becoming the opponent himself. When people fight with the ASURA, they fight with themselves.

BEESTYX

BEESTYX is a JUMPERâ€™s friend. He returned to AYTLO in order to survive. His name - BEE + STYX - in Greek mythology, STYX is the river through which the souls of the dead are transported. He had gone through all the difficulties and now has to swim across the last river to survive.

JUMPER

JUMPER - Rabbit-man, created by combining human and rabbit DNA. His goal is to gain control over AYTLO. After a series of fights with BEESTYX, they became friends. But BEESTYX always wants to defeat Jumper in a duel to prove his superiority.

roadmap

A strong community is the foundation of success. Our main goal is the constant communication with our Holders, so that they know that we are making the right moves, and that moves are made in the right direction.

Our mission is to make AYTLO a well-known brand outside the NFT community, for which we plan to scale. In our team there are people with experience from indie game studios to producing videos of famous musical performers. We intend to provide a high-quality animated series at a high level.

We will launch Staking system with which our holders will receive benefits. The token can be exchanged for a certain amount of $SOL, $USDC and more. Our token will be used to purchase various social & game gifts, participation in raffles on famous NFT and etc.

AYTLO is an emerging brand, and as for any brand, an important aspect is to make the brand known. In order to make the brand more recognizable, we plan to establish cooperation with prominent people from the music and film industry. Of course, we're also mindful about the development of our social networks, which are our representation.

If you want to read more about our roadmap please check our mirror article.

participation rules

  1. Choose your character (Asura; Heat; Beestyx; Jumper)
  2. Create a style, make it unique.
  3. Click the "Share in Twitter" button
  4. Tweet 3 of your friends (you can specify famous people or APTOS)
  5. Click "Go to Twitter"
  6. Tweet your post and be ready to take your 10 Aptos!

What are the prizes?

You will be able to earn 10 APTOS for simple participation in the contest! Very few steps to collect this amount.

HOW TO WIN? Just make it unique, creative and a little lucky for you.
